website_summaries.verdict: An affordable inflatable fishing boat choice for smooth waters.
pros: Constructed of a thick quality vinyl
Seats are designed well and comfortable for rowing
cons: Tends to be a lighter duty raft than others on the market

website_summaries.verdict: If you don't need a lot of space but want a raft that is easy to handle and is affordable, this model offers both quality and a solid deal.
pros: Stands out for its high-pressure inflatable floor that is somewhat sturdier than others in its class
Comes with oars and a pump
cons: Doesn't fit many occupants – rated for 2 adults and possibly a child
Seats are removable, and don't stay put in the raft

customer_reviews.title: This raft is excellent on the lake or in the river
customer_reviews.text: This raft is excellent on the lake or in the river. Fits Two full adults with room for fishing gear and small ice chest, two pole holders very good fishing boat would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan campbell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disapointed: when I open a box I found a package with the boat open. Boat has some scratches. Pump base is broken/ actually it is crushed. There is a whole in a package with paddles.Somebody definitely tried the boat before. There are a lot of scratches on the boat (see photos). I cannot try is the boat still hold the air due to the pump problem. But this is definitely return. And I'm really disappointed and upset. Had family plans on the weekend :(
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Well-designed and economical inflatable dinghy
customer_reviews.text: I use this boat to get to and from a mooring in saltwater. I have been very satisfied with its load carrying, stability, and ease of handling. The included manual pump is effective, durable, and makes short work of inflating the boat. The rigidly inflatable bottom makes getting in and out of my moored boat safe and easy (I'm 73 years old), and the oars and oarlocks are effective and easy to use. The long-term durability of the remains to be proven, but the materials and construction are excellent for an inflatable in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Dick Dowdell

customer_reviews.title: Cracked in couple spots couldn't repair. Summer not gona b as fun as last year
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this raft. But it did not last I stored it in a plastic container after last summer I recently went to get it out now dat the weather is warm. I was devasted when I pulled it out n thur wut cracks in cple spots creating leaks that are unrepairable. Kids n I were looking forward to taking it out on Da river this summer no dice
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: it leaks
customer_reviews.text: Bought it long time ago, but Today is the first time I used it. After 5mins in the water, one side of the boat is leaking quickly. Luckily, I made back to the shore. Maybe i can’t return it after such long time, just hope someone could help me to fix it. It does have some tapes come with boat for fixing the leak, i just don’t know how to use that
customer_reviews.author: yan l.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality raft
customer_reviews.text: Good quality raft. Just super bummed the seats are completely separated from the raft. You just blow them up and shove them into the raft. They end up moving all over the boat and are very annoying. Additionally, before I even received the raft in the mail, the price dropped $50...very annoyed by that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an easy to use dingy for the big boat. It's fun and stable, gets us to shore comfortably and safely.
customer_reviews.author: Robert N Perry

customer_reviews.title: This raft is great. It is tough and my family loves it
customer_reviews.text: This raft is great. It is tough and my family loves it. I wish it came with a bag to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: "New" raft had a manufacture date 2-1/2 years ago (12-2015). Floor has a leak at a fold crease, likely due to being in box for 2-1/2 years. One oar was pop riveted in a misaligned position so paddle face is parallel to water when rowing. The other oar was missing plastic end plug. Bestway would not respond via email despite several attempts. Recommend you steer clear of Bestway and go with Intex.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have used many rafts over the years and paid varied prices as well. I just got back from a trip and used the HydroForce. For the price point and quality, you cannot buy a better raft. Had no issues with the product at all. This raft is durable, stable and is easy to use. I would highly recommend purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super tough, inflates and deflates in no time at ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible boat. My Grandson and i had blast one it. Super tough, inflates and deflates in no time at all. Can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy K

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: As for regular use it is weak , a carp on the line got underneath and was able to puncture it. How ever it is lite weight , backpack in and use for a day, but skin may be 3 layer but thin and there is no rubber bumper, just paint. A good floater, not a good fisher.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Morris

customer_reviews.title: Worth what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall a quality raft. Spacious for getting from dock to boat to beach, back to boat. The pole holders are a great addition. There is a lot of plastic knobs on the outside which hurt if you fall into them. The oars are not parallel with each other making it hard to row, but still possible. Great for the price. Recommend buying and then you can make some adjustments to fit your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Good tender for boat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to have a tender for my 28 foot sailboat, and it works great for that. It inflates easily and rows well. 2 people will have room for extra gear, but 3 adults in this boat would be a tight fit. It does fold down well, especially when I lay it on the dock to get warm and soft in the sun. It goes into a Samsonite 'Tote-a-Ton' bag 32 x 17 x 11 inches, but the pump and oars do not.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered sealed but it did not come with the storage bag as advertised. Kind of adds one more hurdle when packing this for a trip.
customer_reviews.author: M. Main

customer_reviews.title: Great for dog owners
customer_reviews.text: It is a great raft. For under $150 it floats is durable and is fun to use. Inflates fast and I use it with 2 people and a very athletic dog. Paws don't touch it!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: took it to Guadalupe river park. The fabric ended up with a hole the very first day. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: Biman

customer_reviews.title: Amazaing Boat
customer_reviews.text: This boat is amazing. It seems very tough - much better than you average rubber boat. Very stable and comfortable. Recommend using a battery operated inflator because pumping it up by hand will take a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rylaarsdam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boat has no HIN#, so in MY state it can not be registered on MVC, that means I can not put a motor on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: jz5188

customer_reviews.title: The size and configuration is good and the boat is light weight
customer_reviews.text: First one had a chamber that went flat about 20 minutes after I inflated it. Second one was the wrong color, but it wasn't worth the aggravation of sending it back. 3 weeks in and the same chamber is leaking on the replacement. The size and configuration is good and the boat is light weight, but quality is poor.
customer_reviews.author: P. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Boat now inflates great, feels solid and look forward to getting back ...
customer_reviews.text: Parts were missing when boat first arrived, but Amazon replaced immediately. Although I am sure it would have been far cheaper to send me the small parts I needed than an entire new boat.. But I guess its their money. Boat now inflates great, feels solid and look forward to getting back out their to put it through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: sean tyndale-biscoe

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how nice it is for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast! Can't believe how nice it is for the price. We used it to tow a TON of gear to and from an island this weekend. Only thing is, it's not huge so you have to pack it strategically so that the oars don't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Alberini

customer_reviews.title: this thing is a blast on the water and folds up so nicely. I even added the outboard motor to it
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, durable, this thing is a blast on the water and folds up so nicely. I even added the outboard motor to it. very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Connoisseur

customer_reviews.title: Great raft for family fun in calm waters
customer_reviews.text: Great raft for family fun in calm waters. Perfect way to get to and from a moored boat 150 yards off shore. Would suggest it to anyone looking for a medium duty light weight raft. Easy to drag or carry
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinghy!
customer_reviews.text: Great dinghy - excellent action on the oarlocks and the oars lock neatly on the side. Oars are secure enough to leave attach for brief car-topping and leaving at the mooring. Firm feel, spacious, and easy to row when fully loaded with gear. The pump works well enough also.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Seedamaak

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as described. Strong material, not quite as strong as my inflatable sup, but much more than a toy raft. Not sure how a third person would fit. The pump is great, takes about 5 mins for whole boat to pump up. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cknights31

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Don't like the valves for the floor and seats everything else is fine. Nice price, seats are uncomfortable and useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic boat would recommend for first time enthusiasts. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy couldn't ask for a better deal
customer_reviews.text: Great buy couldn't ask for a better deal! Strong material sizable easy trolling motor mont. for the price it doesn't get much better!
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: super nice i yes can wait to take to the sea
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Z.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boat for myself and my 8yo kid
customer_reviews.text: Nice boat for myself and my 8yo kid, won't fit in two adults comfortably. Lightweighted, easy to row. Stays well on the course. I'd appreciate hard benches instead of inflatable seats.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry I

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome kids love it got it for a 13 and ...
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome kids love it got it for a 13 and 11 year old the use it for fishing and works great
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A McCullough Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Raft!
customer_reviews.text: I finally had a chance to get out and Float. I floated the Colorado River below Lake Havasu. This is a great little raft and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Will Sereika

customer_reviews.title: If it lasts it looks like a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and filled with air as billed. No leaks. I didn't have a chance to be on the water much with it so I can't review the durability. If it lasts, it looks like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Cicarelli

customer_reviews.title: Awesome raft
customer_reviews.text: Went down the Reno river in Nevada that is all rocks really shallow and we still had a blast and I made it through in one piece it's a good buy
customer_reviews.author: thad

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Looked like it had been in the box a long time, worn on the folded areas. One of the paddles was broken and the air pump was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: durable and roomy. I've only used it a couple times but it was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MzNikkita

customer_reviews.title: loved it initially but after just 4 uses I now ...
customer_reviews.text: loved it initially but after just 4 uses I now have a slow leak from underneath at a seam and it won't stay inflated....hoping I can get a replacment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good boat, light and strong enough for this price, I am satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: We had so much fun with it this past weekend
customer_reviews.text: We had so much fun with it this past weekend!! I did want the pretty color posted online, mine is grey, :( but other than that love it! I can handle it myself which is so freeing!!
customer_reviews.author: jean

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy boat. Great Oars.
customer_reviews.text: Great very sturdy boat holds up good in Rough Waters stick thick tough material.Love the boat great oars etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not stable.
customer_reviews.text: Boat is very strong, but it is unstable. When you throw a crankbait the boat will move because of crankbait.
customer_reviews.author: seil park

customer_reviews.title: Everything was as described and has held air well so ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described and has held air well so far ( even though I havent had it out, just inside ) but one or the paddles was cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Tylor Marr

customer_reviews.title: We used it to float down the river and while ...
customer_reviews.text: We used it to float down the river and while it worked it did lose some air. I would rather use tubes then this raft.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Casper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. A solid boat for going out in the lake or light rivers. Way better than the $30 boats I kept buying each year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it all weekend with a trolling motor. Stayed filled the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice raft build like a higher quality avon. Just tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Scott

customer_reviews.title: The design is nice but it's more light-duty than the Intex Mariner series
customer_reviews.text: This is not a heavy duty raft as you may be led to believe. The design is nice but it's more light-duty than the Intex Mariner series; not flimsy or anything, just not nearly as robust as others out there. I bought one thinking it was the same and it's not. Intex dorked up the floor design on the new Mariners and put a rigid floor in so I ordered this in hopes it was the same as their old Mariner 3 (Seahawk III). It is not.
customer_reviews.author: Cookies

customer_reviews.title: Well made raft
customer_reviews.text: I have only inflated this in my basement to make sure it doesn’t leak before getting in the water. It’s been inflated for a week, and no leaks! I purchased the Bestway raft after having to return an Intex raft, that did leak. The Hydroforce raft seems very well made and will be just the right size for me, my wife and two small dogs. I really like how the oars attach. My only issue is with the pressure scale. For me anyway, the directions to make sure I’ve inflated the raft properly seem confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Grizzlys of COS

customer_reviews.title: I have to second ARJD's review. Packaging needs to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to second ARJD's review. Packaging needs to be improved! Upon taking it out of the box it had 2 small holes in the bottom compartment. They were due to the folding of the boat in the box. We discovered this whilst on vacation, decided to patch it (didn't want to ruin the kids' vacation!) - it held up OK for a few days. But who wants to have a new inflatable with 2 patches on it? Decided to return it and hope Amazon will do me right and get a new one without holes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert F.

customer_reviews.title: It's all good but I have a problem deflating this boat.
customer_reviews.text: It's all good. Two adults and two kids fit pretty well and we have enough reserve buoyancy. Quite solid construction. The only problem I discovered I cannot fund any pump able to deflate this boat. Because has valves which prevents deflating. I have to put some stick inside a valve and wait a lot of time to deflate it manually. If someone can point me to appropriate pump or just a adapter (because I already have a pump) I would be absolutely happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great rowing dinghy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this dinghy to just row around the harbor when we don't want to use our other dinghy which has a motor. This is a great rowing dinghy, easy to inflate and deflate, plus rows better than the other inflatable rafts we have owned. A big plus is it's lightweight and easy to store when deflated.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope Swanson

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Went floating on the Deschutes River and felt completely confident. It's sturdy and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: she

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Bang for buck this is the best one on the market.
customer_reviews.author: James Milton

customer_reviews.title: Best value for some water fun
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to blowup, and maneuver into the pond. I bought this for my family to use in our backyard pond, after pondering for a couple of years! Between a hard shell 1 or 2 person kayak, and an inflatable kayak or boat. It's hard to pass up the economical advantage to this purchase compared to spending more on a kayak, where it's heavier, holds less people and can't be stored away as easily. If you're looking for some fun on the water, this has proven to be a well designed and strong boat. We usually have one adult and 2 kids in it.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Red

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Got to use it once and the thing got punctured go a small twig
customer_reviews.author: Calvin kos

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I ever purchased a boat. The inflatable boat was easy to inflate and deflate. I would be nice to include a bag for storage but I would defiantly purchase again. The oars are great too. I read reviews about other floating devised with plastic oars that snap, but these oars are metal and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: nicolette pangonis

customer_reviews.title: I know they say that this raft will hold two ...
customer_reviews.text: I know they say that this raft will hold two adults and a small child, but I also found it will hold an adult, several loaves of bread and a lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Bdog

product_meta.title: Bestway HydroForce Marine Pro Inflatable Jon Boat | Raft Includes Oars, Cushioned Seats, & Built-in Storage Compartment | Fits Up to 3 People
product_meta.description: Grab a friend and spend a summer day out on the water in this Best way Hydro-Force Marine Pro boat. Made of premium marine grade material that can withstand the most extreme nautical conditions including exposure to petroleum products and ultraviolet rays, this boat offers superior strength and durability. This boat also features a high-pressure inflatable floor, motor mount grommets, safety-grab rope, Omni-directional oarlocks, comfortable inflatable cushions and a storage bag. Includes one pair of 60" aluminum oars, a storage bag and a 14.5" air pump. Capacity is 2 adults and 1 child. Dimensions: 115" x 50" x 18". Maximum weight capacity is 594 lbs.
feature_bullets: PORTABLE AND CONVENIENT BOAT: The Bestway HydroForce Marine Pro is perfect for fishing or cruising on the open water. With two aluminum oars, built-in fishing rod holders, storage bag, omni-directional oar locks/clasps, handles and a tow ring, it's the affordable and portable option to a traditional fishing boat.

COMFORTABLY SEATS UP TO 3 PEOPLE: An inflatable floor and seats add extra comfort for all riders. The Marine Pro supports 2 adults and 1 child with a maximum load capacity of 594 lbs. Great for exploring lakes or weekend fishing trips with the family!

EXTRA-STRENGTH PVC MATERIAL: Made from heavy-grade PVC, a 3-ply reinforced vinyl, this long-lasting inflatable raft can stand up to the stresses of UV-degradation, abrasion damage, and water pollutants. A repair patch is included in case of emergency tears.

INFLATES & DEFLATES QUICKLY: The 3 separate air chambers within the inflatable boat make it easier to inflate while providing better safety and balance on the water. Inflation valves are simple to use and completely open up for fast deflation.
MULTI-USE GROMMETS: A grab line surrounds the raft with built-in grommets make it easy to tie up to docks. This jon fishing boat is capable of mounting an outboard motor up to 1. 4 HP on the rear.
